content: BTW, @Santiago Pastorino was asking me in privmsg who should "lead" meta WG -- I'm happy to be listed as lead, but I feel like @davidtwco has been playing a leadership role, and @Santiago Pastorino also expressed an interest. I'm happy for the 3 of us to be listed as lead, seem reasonable? I definitely feel like I could use some help in managing things.
btw I added you both to the repository
